whats_new.en_US:
ENHANCEMENTS:
* Make bar wedge-shaped to make it easier to tell which direction is 0 vs 1
* Use user colors in barUse black and white bar
* Use user colors in section ball
* Use accelerometer in tablet mode; otherwise, use keyboard
* Four new 'balls': bowling ball, beachball, feather, rugby
* Notify user when a new fraction has been added
* Use images in background
* Add custom background capability
* Take into account expanded toolbars when positioning objects
* Set mime type to image for chooser (custom ball and image)
BUG FIX:
* Replace combo boxes with button palettes
* Finish incomplete migration to GTK3 for custom ball
* Fix issues with collaboration between more than 2 players
* Account for players leaving in collaboration scheme
